lab: Bio-medical signal and image processing lab
introduction: The interactive experiments in this lab will give the students an opportunity for better understanding and learning basics techniques used in Bio-Medical Signal Processing.

UG: Bio-Medical Engineering , Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering and Instrumentation Engineering
PG: Bio-Medical Engineering , Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering and Instrumentation Engineering

objective: To describe signals mathematically and understand how to perform mathematical operations on signals.

courseAlignment.description: The experiments are targeted at students who have just finished a first course in Digital Processing and Bio-Medical Signal Processing
universities: UG in Bio-Medical Engineering , Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering and Instrumentation Engineering
PG in Bio-Medical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering and Instrumentation Engineering
